meanings.definition: A person who practices or advocates suprematism.
meanings.sent1: The suprematist believed in the power of simplicity in art.
meanings.sent2: The museum featured an exhibit showcasing the works of a famous suprematist.
meanings.sent3: The suprematist walked into the art class wearing a cape made of paintbrushes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, painted with the bold strokes of a suprematist.
meanings.sent5: In the world of art, the suprematist was a revolutionary, challenging traditional norms.

meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed a collection of suprematist paintings.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was inspired by the suprematist art movement.
meanings.sent3: The suprematist color palette consisted of bold primary colors.
meanings.sent4: The room was decorated in a suprematist style, with geometric shapes dominating the space.
meanings.sent5: The suprematist design principles focused on abstraction and simplicity.

meanings.sent1: The artist's work had a suprematist feel, with clean lines and stark contrasts.
meanings.sent2: The suprematist elements in the painting added depth and intrigue.
meanings.sent3: Her suprematist approach to fashion turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night took on a suprematist quality, with lights forming abstract patterns.
meanings.sent5: The suprematist influence could be seen in the architecture of the modern building.
